messages.subject: webpage update
messages.msgSnippet: If you re interested in a map of Toba-Fushimi and the casualties report for the big battle there pop on over to Shinsengumihq.com to check em out... All new
messages.messageBody:
If you're interested in a map of Toba-Fushimi and the casualties report
for the big battle there pop on over to Shinsengumihq.com to check 'em
out...
All new stuff is linked from the home page so you don' t have to search
for it.

Yes I know it took me long enough to get that bright idea working....;-)

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
